title: #335 Rooftop deck/lounge, Laundry in unit, 10 Weeks FREE!!
posting_body: ['THE FUTURE LIVES HERE', 'OUR BRAND NEW, luxury apartments are located in the vibrant, walk-able Jack London District of Oakland.', 'Fourth Street East offers spacious studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom homes and lofts with luxurious finishes and amenities.', 'Many of the 330 living spaces come with private balconies overlooking the Oakland waterfront.', 'Top floor mezzanine loft spaces include private outdoor patios, providing views of downtown and the Oakland Hills.', 'Interior touches include high-end appliances, solid surface countertops, modern cabinetry with upgraded hardware as well as faux wood flooring.', 'You can also view our video <URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 113', 'OR Text', '113', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 709 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Slow-close cabinets and drawers', '- Waterfall edge quartz counters', '- French door, stainless refrigerator', '- Keyless entry for residence doors', '- Soaking tubs', '- Floor-to-ceiling windows', '- Smart Nest thermostat', '- Full-size vented washer and dryer', '- Spacious walk-in closets', '- Custom MechoSystem roller shades', '- Private decks', '- Walk-in showers', '- Private rooftop terraces', '- Wood-look luxury flooring', '- Luxury tub with tile surrounds', '- Smart light switch', '- Recessed lighting', '- Kitchen island', 'Community Amenities', '- Pool and Spa', '- Controlled-access building', '- Co-working lounge', '- Transit screens', '- Pet spa', '- Rooftop sky deck/lounge', '- Library lounge', '- Electric car charging station', '- Fireside lounges', '- Bike room', '- Private dining room', "- Chef's kitchen", '- DIY workshop', '- Grilling areas', '- 2000+ sq ft. fitness center', '- Rentable storage units', '- 24 hour package storage', '- Game room', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'No size limit', 'Aggressive breed restrictions', '$500 Pet deposit', '$60 per month', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 x the rent', 'Driving Directions', 'Leasing office is located on the corner of 4th St and Madison St.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Fourth Street East', '150 4th St, Oakland, CA, 94607', 'xWAz12QQz']
